Summary: triangular four lighted ufo.it had three lights on each point and one smaller red light in the middle
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 19th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brother blane were looking at the moon when we see these strange lights in the sky.when we observed the lights closer up wae noticed the shape of the ufo.it was a triangular black ufo.it was slightly more black than the sky.the sky looked to be a dark purple.we are at the address of 1081 Cave Springs rd.we are down a hidden driveway.there is a pasture to the side of our driveway.when i first notised it i thiught it was a plane but i examined it closer and saw the black outline with four lights on the bottom. there were three yellow lights and one red lightin the middle.the ufo had strange flight patterns.it was fast one moment, slow another,and then it started going down.it disappeared below the trees and turned around and flew back behind ur house and just dis appeared.honestly when i first recognized it as a ufo i was really scared.i didn't know what to do.all i could do is sit there and stare into space.
